summary.position: Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering
research_focus: Effects of AI on software security, software quality, maintenance
AI in code generation, software testing, architecture design
Integrating AI and machine learning into software systems
Explainable and responsible AI models for software development
Design science in creating and evaluating AI tools for software development
AI agents in collaborative software development
Using AI for knowledge management in software development
responsibilities: Preparation of national and international research and education projects
Planning and implementation of bachelor's, master's, and doctoral education
Supervision of final theses and doctoral studies
Increasing awareness that serves industry and the economy
Participating in preparation of projects as an expert
General administrative work related to the university's operation

duration: fixed term of four years (assistant/associate professor)

summary.eligibility: Candidates must present up-to-date research merits in AI related to software engineering.

dates.closing_date: 11 August 2025 at 12 noon, Finnish local time (UTC + 3h)
